languages.text: "Устремляем силы все на борьбу с врагами Его, ибо мученичество есть единственный путь воздаяния за жертву и раны Его..."

traits.locale_text:
[Draft] Чувствую свои кости: они сильны.
Чувствую свои мышцы: они сильны.
Чувствую свою душу: она сильна.
Чувствую Императора, что милостив ко мне, и волей Его: я силен.

languages.text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."
languages.original_text: "Устремляем силы все на борьбу с врагами Его, ибо мученичество есть единственный путь воздаяния за жертву и раны Его..."

traits.locale_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."
"Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."
"Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

languages.text: “让我们把全部力量，都用来对付祂的敌人吧。因为只有殉道，才是偿还祂的牺牲与祂的伤痛的唯一途径……”
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

traits.locale_text: “让我们把全部力量，都用来对付祂的敌人吧。因为只有殉道，才是偿还祂的牺牲与祂的伤痛的唯一途径……”

languages.text: «Dirijamos nuestras fuerzas contra sus enemigos, pues solo en el martirio podremos redimir su sacrificio y sus heridas...».
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

traits.locale_text: «Dirijamos nuestras fuerzas contra sus enemigos, pues solo en el martirio podremos redimir su sacrificio y sus heridas...».

languages.text: 「皆の力を、皇帝の敵と戦うために合わせましょう。殉教こそ、主の犠牲と傷を癒す唯一の方法なのです…」
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

traits.locale_text: 「皆の力を、皇帝の敵と戦うために合わせましょう。殉教こそ、主の犠牲と傷を癒す唯一の方法なのです…」

languages.text: "Lasst uns alle unser Kraft für den Kampf gegen Seine Feinde verwenden, denn nur als Märtyrer können wir Sein Opfer und Seine Wunden ausgleichen ..."
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns alle unser Kraft für den Kampf gegen Seine Feinde verwenden, denn nur als Märtyrer können wir Sein Opfer und Seine Wunden ausgleichen ..."

languages.text: « Employons notre force à vaincre Ses ennemis, car le martyre constitue la seule voie possible pour honorer Son sacrifice et Ses blessures... »
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."

traits.locale_text: « Employons notre force à vaincre Ses ennemis, car le martyre constitue la seule voie possible pour honorer Son sacrifice et Ses blessures... »

languages.text: "Gücümüzü O'nun düşmanlarına karşı savaşmak için kullanalım. O'nun fedakârlığı ve O'nun yaraları için verebileceğimiz tek karşılık şehitliktir."
languages.original_text: "Let us all direct our strength to fight against His enemies, for martyrdom is the only way to redeem His sacrifice and His wounds..."
